projects.name: Smart Street Light Monitoring System using ioT
projects.description: Developed a system to manage and optimize street lighting infrastructure using IoT technology. Implemented real-time monitoring and control capabilities for proactive maintenance and energy savings. Enabled the street lights to automatically switch ON and OFF based on the presence of darkness and movement, thereby reducing power consumption. Achieved reduced energy consumption, effective fault detection, and reduced downtime.

projects.name: Development Software For AAC for persons with different disabilities
projects.description: Augmented and Alternative Communication software tailored to meet the diverse needs of individuals with various disabilities. The software will provide a customizable and accessible platform to enhance communication and improve the quality of life for the users. They face challenges and express themselves through traditional means.
